settings.howToPlayDescription: The goal is to visit every square on the board exactly once, moving like a knight in chess. A knight moves in an 'L' shape: two squares in one direction (horizontally or vertically) and then one square perpendicularly.

legal.privacyContent: Our application respects your privacy. We only store your game settings (like board size and theme) in your browser's local storage. This data is stored on your device and is not sent to our servers. In the future, we may use Google Analytics to collect anonymous usage data to help us improve the game. This data will be aggregated and will not contain any personally identifiable information.
legal.termsContent: By using this game, you agree to these terms. This game is provided for free, for personal, non-commercial use. You agree not to use automated scripts to play the game or to disrupt the service. We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time.
legal.cookiesContent: This site uses cookies and similar technologies. A 'cookie' is a small piece of data stored on your device. We use browser's `localStorage` to save your game configuration. This is essential for the game to remember your preferences between sessions. We may also use cookies for analytics purposes (e.g., Google Analytics) to understand how players interact with the game, which helps us to improve it. By using our site, you consent to this.

cookieConsent.message: We use cookies to enhance your experience and for analytics. By continuing to use this site, you consent to our use of cookies.
